title: I Am Ali
description: Boxing champ Muhammad Ali's audio journal offers deeply personal insight into the outspoken athlete's life and influence at the height of his career.
actors: Muhammad Ali

title: I Am Bolt
description: Mixing archival footage with present-day interviews, Olympic champion and global icon Usain Bolt opens up about his athletic legacy.
actors: Usain Bolt

title: I Am Kalam
description: An intelligent boy born into poverty befriends the son of a once noble family and is inspired by the life of India's president to pursue an education.
actors: Gulshan Grover, Harsh Mayar, Pitobash, Hussan Saad

title: I Am Michael
description: Gay activist Michael Glatze begins a painful journey when he decides to renounce his sexuality for his religion in this drama based on true story.
actors: James Franco, Zachary Quinto, Emma Roberts, Charlie Carver

title: I Am Not a Serial Killer
description: A small-town teenager with troubling impulses must embrace his dark side if he wants to keep a serial killer from murdering again.
actors: Max Records, Laura Fraser, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Baldwin

title: I Am Not an Easy Man
description: A shameless chauvinist gets a taste of his own medicine when he wakes up in a world dominated by women and locks horns with a powerful female author.
actors: Vincent Elbaz, Marie-Sophie Ferdane, Pierre Benezit, Blanche Gardin

title: I Am Not Madame Bovary
description: To qualify for an apartment reserved for singles, a married couple stages a divorce. But when her husband unexpectedly remarries, Li seeks justice.
actors: Fan Bing-bing, Guo Tao, Da Peng, Zhang Jiayi

title: I Am Number Four
description: After nine aliens flee their home planet to find peace on Earth, their plans are shattered by pursuers who must kill them in numerical order.
actors: Alex Pettyfer, Timothy Olyphant, Teresa Palmer, Dianna Agron

title: I Am Sun Mu
description: A North Korean propagandist who escaped to Seoul now creates satirical art about Kim Jong Il's regime and copes with repercussions of his defection.

title: I Am the Pretty Thing That Lives in the House
description: A nervous nurse who scares easily finds herself caring for an ailing horror novelist while living in a house with hidden secrets.
actors: Ruth Wilson, Bob Balaban, Lucy Boynton, Paula Prentiss

title: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore
description: A timid nursing assistant gets a new lease on life when she and a neighborhood loner track down the degenerates who broke into her house.
actors: Melanie Lynskey, Elijah Wood, David Yow, Jane Levy

title: I Fine... Thank You... Love You
description: Desperate to go to the U.S. to win back his girlfriend, Yim hires a tutor to teach him English. But things don't go according to plan.
actors: Preechaya Pongthananikorn, Sunny Suwanmethanont, Sora Aoi, Puttachat Pongsuchat

title: I Give It a Year
description: In this romantic comedy, newlyweds Nat and Josh find their marriage beginning to fall apart almost immediately after their fairy tale wedding.
actors: Rose Byrne, Rafe Spall, Anna Faris, Simon Baker

title: I Hate Luv Storys
description: This Bollywood spoof recounts the ups and downs of an assistant film director who loathes romance and a designer who adores all things sentimental.
actors: Imran Khan, Sonam Kapoor, Sammir Dattani, Samir Soni

title: I Love You
description: Tired of her passionless marriage, Marianne wants a separation from her husband, Gustav, who, in response, decides to make a big change of his own.
actors: Björn Kjellman, Christine Meltzer, Rodolfo Corsato, Martina Haag

title: I Remember You
description: Young urbanites renovating a rundown house, and a psychiatrist grieving his son's disappearance, are connected to a supernatural, decades-old secret.
actors: Jóhannes Haukur Jóhannesson, Ágústa Eva Erlendsdóttir, Elma Stefania Agustsdottir, Thor Kristjansson

title: I Saw the Sun
description: A 25-year war forces members of a Kurdish family to abandon their ancestral village in Southeast Turkey and relocate to bustling, modern-day Istanbul.
actors: Mahsun Kırmızıgül, Altan Erkekli, Demet Evgar, Murat Ünalmış

title: I'm in Love with a Church Girl
description: When a tough-minded ex-drug dealer falls for a beautiful but highly devout woman, their mutual attraction takes them both down a twisty path.
actors: Ja Rule, Adrienne Bailon, Stephen Baldwin, Vincent Pastore

title: I, Olga Hepnarova
description: This drama explores the short and difficult life of one of Czechoslovakia's most notorious murderers, who drove a truck into a Prague crowd in 1973.
actors: Michalina Olszańska, Martin Pechlát, Klára Melísková, Marika Soposká

title: Ibiza
description: When Harper is sent to Spain for an important work meeting, her hard-partying friends tag along and convince her to pursue a fling with a famous DJ.

title: Icarus
description: In his Oscar-winning film, an American cyclist plunges into a vast doping scandal involving a Russian scientist -- Putin's most-wanted whistleblower.
actors: Bryan Fogel, Grigory Rodchenkov

description: Sidelined by an injury and a relocation to a new town, a teen figure skater gets back on the ice thanks to the support of a local skating rink owner.
actors: Michaela du Toit, Lara Daans, Arcadia Kendal, Sheila McCarthy

title: Ice Guardians
description: This film explores the controversial role of ice hockey "enforcers," as well as the physical and mental price paid by the game's notorious tough guys.
actors: Dave Brown, Brett Hull, Rob Ray, Jarome Iginla

title: Iceman
description: Four hundred years after they were frozen in time, a Ming Dynasty guard and his three pursuers are defrosted to continue their ancient battle.
actors: Donnie Yen, Wang Baoqiang, Shengyi Huang, Yu Kang

title: Içimdeki Ses
description: Insecure writer Selim finds a chance at happiness with Aysil, the girl of his dreams, but his live-in mother is keeping a watchful eye on her son.

description: After an actor is hit by a car driven by the police commissioner's sister, his scheming brother-in-law files a bogus suit against the commissioner.
actors: Bhargavi Chirmuley, Mahesh Kothare, Sachin, Ashok Saraf

description: Desperate to save her dying sister, Ayia enlists the help of a priest, who subjects them to a harrowing journey through their subconscious minds.
actors: Polina Davydova, Lyubov Ignatushko, Evgeniy Gagarin, Andrey Abramichev

title: Il giovane favoloso
description: While battling poor health, Italian poet and philosopher Giacomo Leopardi finds the strength to lead an extraordinary life.

description: In 2029, the elite police squad Illang combats a terrorist group opposing reunification of the two Koreas. But another enemy may be lurking nearby.

title: Illegal
description: Her daughter afflicted by a rare epilepsy, Katiele tries desperately to obtain the only thing that can relieve it: a substance derived from marijuana.

description: This anthology illustrates the timeless nature of desire in four stories of incest, bloodlust and other forbidden subjects.
actors: Lise Danvers, Fabrice Luchini, Charlotte Alexandra, Paloma Picasso

title: Imperial Dreams
description: A young father returns home from jail eager to care for his son and become a writer, but crime, poverty and a flawed system threaten his plans.

title: In Bruges
description: After a job goes wrong in London, two hit men are ordered to lay low at a bed-and-breakfast in Bruges, Belgium, until their boss contacts them.

title: In Darkness
description: A blind pianist fears for her life after the suspicious death of her neighbor, the daughter of a businessman accused of war crimes.
actors: Natalie Dormer, Ed Skrein, Emily Ratajkowski, Neil Maskell

description: A lawyer's husband is having an affair. When his mistress is found dead, he becomes the prime suspect -- and his wife must take charge of his defense.
actors: Judith Light, Michael Ontkean, Jerry Orbach, Pat Corley

title: In Order of Disappearance
description: When he sets out to avenge his son's murder, mild-mannered snowplow driver Nils sparks a war between a Norwegian mobster and his Serbian rival.

description: A naive and sheltered young woman embarks on a whimsical adventure across Italy in the hopes of meeting director Federico Fellini.

title: In the Name of Honor
description: In this raw exploration of honor killings, family members and survivors shed light on the forces that drive loving relatives to commit brutal acts.

title: In the Shadow of Iris
description: The sudden disappearance of a wealthy banker's wife cracks open a dizzying world of secret fetishes, desperate acts and elaborate deceptions.
actors: Romain Duris, Charlotte Le Bon, Jalil Lespert, Camille Cottin

title: In Their Shoes
description: Filmmaker Atul Sabharwal explores the centuries-old shoemaking trade in Agra, India, where once-flourishing craftsmen face new economic pressures.

title: In This Corner of the World

title: In-Lawfully Yours
description: A recently divorced New Yorker moves to a small town and falls for a local pastor, who happens to be her ex's brother-in-law.

description: Grief-stricken over the death of his true love, singer-songwriter Metin has given up on life, until he meets Gizem, who slowly reawakens his heart.

title: Incomplete
description: A man returns to his childhood hometown, where he meets the happily married woman he once jilted, while his best friend endures a more volatile union.
actors: Ritwick Chakraborty, Swastika Mukherjee, Paoli Dam, Bratya Basu

title: Infinity Chamber
description: After waking up in an automated maximum-security prison, a man confronts his robotic jailor and recalls vivid scenes from the world outside.
actors: Christopher Soren Kelly, Cassandra Clark, Cajardo Lindsey, Jesse D. Arrow

title: Influx
description: Italians in London reveal the ups and downs of immigration and touch upon their uneasiness about leaving behind their crisis-ridden homeland.

description: An ad agency CEO is put under investigation when his ambitious protégée -- and lover -- accuses him of sexual harassment, vying for his top position.

title: Innsaei
description: Renowned thinkers and spiritualists discuss the Icelandic concept of innsæi, which enables humans to connect through empathy and intuition.

description: A writer becomes the prime suspect in a police investigation, following a series of murders that are identical to those in her books.
actors: Manoj Bajpayee, Isha Koppikar, Netra Raghuraman, Sharat Saxena

title: International Street Art
description: Absorbing images of vibrant street art from New York, Paris, Berlin and Sao Paulo reveal how urban artists elevate the mundane into a thing of beauty.
